name: Robett Robinson
text:
Excellent service, good prices.
They also have coffee

name: Randall Horne
text: Great prices and great customer service

name: Cassie Walden
text: Kenny was awesome! Got me what I needed and even took it out to the car for me!

name: Jack Sanchez
text: Dependable and courteous staff. Always a pleasure dropping in.

name: George Glass
text: Great people at counter

name: Bob Frick
text:
Can't live without them!!
We cooling now.

name: English Farms
text: First time in , looks like they have a good selection. Noticed klien, greenlee, ideal, and others in showroom . Seems like a nice bunch to deal with, were very helpful. I purchased a couple of foam mice / Piston to use for putting a pull string through counduit. Store looks clean and organized. Located in the Pell City industrial park,

name: Bobbi White
text: Great place to shop for Electric supplies

name: Darryl Floyd
text: Very pleasant! I was cared for by staff very speedly and professional.

name: Thomas Sears
text: The people at the store are nice, but the online ordering is terrible. Got the wrong number of bolts the first time, then they sent a replacement bolt and it was missing the nut, so I had to go buy that separately. Won't order from Fastenal again

name: Scott Moss
text: The young lady behind the counter is helpful and great. Their online ordering and pick up in the stores is disorganized and terrible.

name: Alexa Wiley
text: Very helpful! David went above and beyond to help my mom and I find some odd sized bolts we were looking for!

name: Kelly Falter
text: Not sure what the previous review was referring to about high prices.  I have been buying fasteners from them for a few years now.  They are a fraction of the price of Home Depot or Lowe's and if they don't have what you need, they can usually get it in house within a day or so.

name: Bolt Movers
text:
Fastenal, a company with 2,683 stores CANNOT give you refund except for the store that you purchased the product at.

Because there computer system does not communicate with any of the other stores.

Unfortunately the product was purchased out of town and now I will need to drive 4 hours to get the $98 dollar refund for the screws that were purchased.

Keep in mind it is 2019. I could FaceTime with Ariana Grande across the country at a moments notice, she just never answers my calls.

name: Walter Rice
text: Great staff great selection

name: Jessica Reece
text: There are no prices posted on anything and instead of allowing me to just look around while my husband looked for a fastener he specifically needed, I was followed like I was some criminal. We left without buying anything because the price was more than triple what is in their website. Ridiculous to treat people like criminals and then try to rob us.

name: Matt Reed
text: I have worked with Ron, Monica, and Robert for over a 15 years. They have always treated me like family. They've  honored all agreements that we've entered into. They have selflessly helped us succeed. I highly recommend working with Hardy Machinery.

name: Blair Jones
text: Great group of guys! You need a machine they have it.

name: Ron Burgundy
text:
Best service, work ethic, and providing those flooring needs, I suppose. A+

Thanks for the tshirt!

name: Hagan Jackson
text: Great service,knowledgeable staff

name: Mark Havira
text: The staff knew exactly what we needed and were very helpful.

name: Laura Malone
text: Jesse did a great job fixing the other guy's mistake in our new house.He finished the job and corrected what the first guy messed up in a timely manner. Would highly recommend these guys for your floors and carpet.

name: Darrell Vahary
text: Great place to get ALL your hardwood flooring products and get questions answered. Prices are very reasonable and they can even help you find someone to install and finish your floor for you

name: Josh Templet
text: Great employees with tons of knowledge in the flooring industry!

name: Tyson DeAngelis
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable staff

name: Kenny Hastings
text: Great service, friendly employees

name: GARRY BARKSDALE
text: The show room is fabulous.  Melanie Mcbay has done a fantastic job with the design.

name: Dustin Shannon
text: Kenny & Company is the most friendliest, helpful, knowledgeable and honest Bath and Kitchen showroom in Northern Alabama. Melanie sure enjoyed assisting my partner and I with searching for that right Freestanding Tub for our bathroom remodel. It was a stressful experience because I tried to work with another company in Huntsville and was discriminated. Melanie gave me the best customer service, I am not sure what I would have done if it wasn't for her. I definitely recommend anyone who needs help with anything relating to Bathrooms and Kitchens to Melanie/Kenny & Company!!! Melanie is the Tub Queen of Alabama 💚

name: James Hood
text: The guys at Kenny Pipe are awesome. Very professional and knowledgeable.

name: Bob Frederickson
text: Great service, service and they stand behind their products!

name: Rachel Kidd
text: Great prices. Kevin was superb!

name: Michael Hamilton
text: It's a good place to start work at.

name: James Tillman
text: Great service

name: Steven Jamison
text: Helpful and knowledgeable staff

name: Christina Craig
text:
I am so pleased with the way Judson & Company handles their business and the quality of their items.
Every single order I have placed has been delivered in not time at all! The package comes with the items pre packaged, makes it easy for resell.

I highly recommend becoming a premier member. Free shipping, low minimum and only $9.99, that’s something you can’t pass up!

I currently run two businesses and Judson & Company has made this the best experience yet. We look forward to dealing business with them as should you!

name: Kay Birch
text: This company is the BEST!!! I have been in the retail business for 30 years, and have not worked with a better wholesaler in all those years! Fantastic selection of merchandise, great quality in that merchandise, and exceptional customer service. Thank you, Judson and Company,  I love your products, and my customers do too!!!

name: G M
text: My first order I was definitely nervous but I am happy to say that my order was absolutely perfect! The shipping time was fast! The quality was on point and the invoice enclosed with my items was a nice extra touch! Do not hesitate to order from this top notch supplier!

name: Sherry Brooks
text: I have been ordering from Judson for a couple of years for the Boutique I manage... their products are of a great quality, the prices are reasonable, the customer service is on top of things and ready to help.  It's the only web site I can order at least 1 item instead of the usual 6 or 12 at a time, this works best for us since we are a small store.

name: Alissa Kitchens
text: This is the absolute BEST company to purchase your wholesale needs from!!! They have amazing products at incredible prices and their customer service is the best I’ve ever received in any industry!!! You will not be disappointed!

name: STAFF HEARTLAND & CO.
text: Their prices are just a little more then others. However totally worth it for the expedited shipping turn around. I have been ordering from them for 4 years. Love their products!

name: Jessica Hale
text: I am soooo happy with my purchase from Judson & Company! They put “premium” on the leggings and the quality is just that- premium!! They are definitely my go-to suppliers for leggings now!

name: Connie McAllister
text: Judson has been a great asset to my boutique :)  Price point is incredible , delivery in a timely manner :)  The free shipping is a great plus !!!!   I just wish there was a wider range of choices <3  TY

name: Beth Minyard
text: Always a great selection, super fast shipping and excellent customer service!

name: MeLinda's Fine Gifts
text: Awesome products, always shipped fast! Great company to work with!

name: Tori Watts
text: Fast shipping. Products are as shown and great quality!

name: Jackie Lennert
text: I stock many of Judson's products in my boutique in WNY. Quality is top notched, service is quick, and pricing is good. I will continue to use this wholesale company for my store.

name: Larrecia Williams
text: I have had nothing but great experiences with Judson and Company. The prices are reasonable and comparable merchandise to choose from.

name: kym price
text: Love all judson merchandise! ! Good quality  and affordable prices where you can make some profit too. If you have any problems they stand by their word . Thank you for all your hard work !! Ya'll Rock !!

name: Josh Young
text: I ordered 11 beach bags from this company. One had the print upside down on the bag so I sent a picture. All I was offered was store credit. Several of the other bags I purchased had pieces of the wording peeling off--horrible quality. Good customer service would have sent me a new bag for the defective or sent a shipping label so I could send it back at no charge for a refund. I will not be ordering here again.

name: Jennifer Morton
text: I have ordered twice for my small business and the quality was great and shipping was fast. Thanks so much.

name: Bobby Phillips
text: Nothing but great products and customer service from Judson.  I have been pleased with everyone I have talked to, either over the phone or in person at AmericasMart in Atlanta.

name: Amber Hawthorne
text: Rita is absolutely amazing! She provides outstanding customer service and made me feel like she cared which is very rare these days.

resp.text: Amber, thank you so much for your lovely review! We are thrilled to have you as our customer!

name: PATRICK STATON
text: Great prices

name: Vince Curtis
text: Great service over the last 45 years , lasting relationships have been formed in these years also, they are like family & some cases better, Chad is awesome!!!

name: visiting places
text: Showroom open to the public  (indoor and outdoor luxury furnishings)

resp.text: Indeed! Our retail store is attached to the Corporate office. Thanks for taking a look around.

name: Benjamin L
text: Great looking furniture but the prices are extremely high. Sales staff was rude when we mentioned it was out of our budget.

resp.text: Benjamin, we appreciate your feedback. Our mission is to provide a pleasurable shopping experience and we are sorry to hear yours was less than. We would love the chance to have you back in!

name: Chad Bloomfield
text: The best looking outdoor furniture you will find!

resp.text: Thank you, Chad!

name: Trina Croom
text: Great place

name: Dave V
text: Good variety....kind of pricey. Check the bargain bin area to piece a more cost sensible patio set together.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving a review, Dave! The outlet is location right down the street at 111 Hinds Street, and you're right, you can find incredible deals on our luxury goods there. Hope to have you out again soon.

name: Kim gothard
text: I work here

name: Arthur Smith
text: Great place of business it's a good corporation to work for

resp.text: Thank you, Arthur!

name: Amber Gomez-Mueller
text: The folks that work in the retail store ate fabulous! Jason, Rachel, Celeste, and Robin are all very friendly and attentive.

resp.text: Amber, this means the most! We love our design consultants, too!

name: tina mccartney
text: It's a great place to work

resp.text: Thank you, Tina! We appreciate you.

name: Jason Smith
text: Great place to PU from

resp.text: Thank you so much for your response and we hope to see you again soon.

name: Gerardo Hernandez
text: Furniture selections are beautiful!

resp.text: Gerardo, we take great pride in this comment. Thank you!

name: Pamela Carroll
text: Such a great place!!!

resp.text: Pamela, this means the world. We appreciate you!

name: Savonah Vidal
text: I work there

name: John Briscoe
text: Purchased tile and plumbing from Pro-Source outstanding experience. Scottie English was sales person she made it flow smooth and easy like purchased should.

name: Proud Parent
text:
I bought cabinets from ProSource at the end of August. The date of install would be Sept 1st - 5th. I am still waiting on Sept 25th for the cabinets to arrive. No date can be given... I have told them I am waiting to sell the house and the cabinets are costing me the mortgage. How long will I have to wait? No one can tell me. I have several interested buyers in the home right now. This company does not care about you or your project.

***UPDATE SEPT 29TH***
I had the pleasure to work with Trent a ProSource employee. He was great to find the answers for me that I did not have. I had the company delivering the cabinets calling me providing me updates directly. As a customer if I could go through ProSource myself I would. I appreciate the follow through.

resp.text:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Client and member satisfaction is our top priority and we’re happy we were able to get in contact with you to discuss finding a resolution. We appreciate your feedback and communication with the showroom as well as your patience and understanding.

name: Brad McClellan
text: Large selection. Not pushy salespeople. Knowledgeable.

name: Randy Englebert
text: Great equipment, if they would only sale to their loyal Carrier and Bryant dealers

name: Robert Rutledge
text:
A company is only as good as the people that represent it. Gulf Shores hit the motherload. Charlie Hastings is the manager. Charlie and his staff are friendly and very knowledgeable. He has a degree in marketing and most of his clients would do themselves a favor to listen to his ideas in that area.
Oh yeah, Mingledorff's has everything you need. Well stocked and can pull an order fast.

name: John Glenn
text: Great service.

name: Robert Rutledge
text: Billy is the most helpful guy you will ever meet.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Randy Brown
text: We have been doing business with M&A for many years now and they provide outstanding service in all areas. The sales staff, delivery drivers, counter personnel and their tech people all are ready to help you with whatever your HVAC needs are. Our Regional Sales Manager Tim Belcher has gone above and beyond to work with us to establish a working partnership between our companies. I don't think you can go wrong dealing with M&A Supply, really good people to deal with.

resp.text: Thank you Randy!

name: laurie oleary
text: M&A Supply is a great partner.  They provide continuous support and seek out resources to help their dealers create success.  They really get it!

resp.text: Thank you Laurie!

name: James McCryndle
text: M & A is the best wholesale distributor and manufacturer of heating and air conditioning supplies in the area.  Their employees are always there to make sure I am satisfied each time I need something. I would choose them over another company anyday!

resp.text: Thank you James!

name: Keith Head
text: Head's Heating & Air have been in business for over 40 years.  We rely on our vendors to help us in various situations and sometimes this has us calling them right at closing for us to help our customers in there time of need. M&A is always there to help and they do what they can to locate the parts we need.  A another satisfied customer and lots of thanks to Tim Belcher Regional Sales Manager for all he does to keep us updated.

resp.text: Thank yo Keith!

name: Kevin Pry
text: WE ARE HAPPY TO HAVE M&A AS A VENDOR I HAVE USED THE COMPANY FOR YEARS THE TEAM IS HELPFUL, NICE, AND HAS A GOOD AMOUNT OF STOCK AVAILABLE WE VALUE M&A AS OUR YORK CONTACT POINT FOR THE PRODUCT LINE. WE HAVE NOTICED THAT COMMERCIAL QUOTES OUR DONE IN HOUSE AT THE MOBILE LOCATION WHICH HAS BEEN A ADDED VALUE, WE ARE LOOKING FORWARD TO MANY MORE YEARS OF BUSINESS TOGETHER.WHEN WE NEED YORK RELATED PRODUCTS WE WILL BE CALLING. THX !

resp.text: Thank you Kevin!

name: Keith Morrison
text: M & A is a good vendor partner.  They are reliable and make every effort to help with the things we need.

resp.text: Thank you Keith!

name: Russell Fife
text: I have pretty much quit doing business due to complete lack of competence. They closed the Panama City branch and Mobile should follow closely. York products have caused my business to lose $$.

name: 2 Tall Ted Lynn
text: Great little place to get things you may not ever find again they have it and i am letting everyone know just how great this place is.

name: Rohit Choudhary
text:
Easy to find and enough space to maneuver smoothly plus they got a scale in the back of the plant. I was loaded within 45 mins, only problem took 3 hours to get paperwork !
Staff is friendly !

name: Karen Mcallister
text: 1st time at this location i was in and out within 30 mins. Very friendly staff. Overnight parking is available.

name: Jack Lolley
text: Took a long time to replace one of my windows but other than that a fine place to do business

name: Larry Smith
text: They was no help at all they suck

name: Robert Bozett
text: Missed my turn & Google sent me thru a pig trail .but, I did get there fine.

name: J.D. Smith
text: Great customer service.

name: FAST AZ SERVICES
text: Really great company and friendly staff

name: cynthia benton
text: Bobby goes above and beyond make sure customer is taken care of ,friendly service great prices.

name: Mark Black
text: Where can I visit ABC they are great folks very helpful for a novice

name: Dan Carr
text: ABC I by far the best supply house for roofing materials Hands down. And very friendly and helpful 😎

name: Kenny Metz
text: A Great Company to do Business With !

name: Matthew Hyzny
text: Very good  Service

name: Charlie Turner
text: Very professional

name: Kentrell Franklin
text: Great

name: Ryan Richards
text: The Huntsville branch of m and a are fantastic people. They get us quick responses on availability of parts and have made special orders to accommodate us. Great job fellas!

resp.text: Thank you Sara!

name: Eric Glasgow
text: Great company, Great People. This company takes care of there customers. Hands down, best around! Thanks for outstanding service!

resp.text: Thank you, Eric!

name: April Self
text: Great business! Friendly staff! Always, always very helpful, and they do a great job getting parts and units to me in a timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you April!

name: Megan H
text: This is a great company to work with. Honest hard working people. Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Megan!

name: Aaron Guise
text: I would highly recommend this supply house! We have been installing YORK systems for several years now. You just can’t beat the customer service at M&A.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron!

name: Keith Tolliver
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Handle any issues quickly and efficiently. Stand behind their equipment and material.

resp.text: Thank you Keith!

name: Shane Taylor
text: Great supply house for all of you HVAC needs. They carry YORK commercial and residential equipment.  Only  HVAC contractors are allowed to buy any of their products..

resp.text: Thank you Shane!

name: Jerry Hare
text:
Working with Jeff and his crew in Huntsville has been great.
Jeffs work ethic and get it done attitude is something you don’t see much of these days
A great asset to the M&A name

resp.text: Thanks Jerry!

name: Steve Wallace
text: Great place to do business with! Excellent service and great products!

text: Always top notch service and quick to respond when looking for replacement parts and new HVAC equipment pricing!

name: Christopher Branford
text: Great company to work with. Good stand up people.

name: Aimee Park
text: Love this company and the guys that work there! Without them, we’d be left in the cold!

resp.text: Thank you Gerald!

text: Great group of guys to work with !!!!!!!

name: Matthew Goodwin
text: M&A

name: SONYA
text: Marilyn was very helpful. She made sure I knew what items were on sale. She even showed me how to use the app.

name: stephanie lorino
text: Always clean and organized!

name: Nubian Nailz
text: Very courteous staff & helpful!!

name: Brittaney Clark
text: I absolutely love this place. We just bought our king bed from them. & made sure it was delivered today! The lady there was the best and made me feel comfortable and she made sure I loved what I bought. Thank you so much for the experience.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in and doing business with us. It was our pleasure to get to serve you.

name: Richard Schneider
text: We bought a queen size mattress and box spring. We got excellent customer service. We love the set we got so far.

resp.text: Thank you for doing business with us. We are glad your are enjoying purchase.

name: David Conner
text: Great place to shop for a great bed. Mrs Eunice is a great sales lady and gives you time and space to decide on what you like and want. Thanks for your patience and time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for doing business with us.  It was our pleasure to serve you. We hope you are enjoying your bed. Rest well.

name: Jeff Reynolds
text: Excellent experience, by far the best deal we have ever gotten on a mattress box spring set. Can't reccomend enough.

resp.text: Thank you!!! We hope you enjoy your mattress for many years to come. Thank you for doing business with us.

name: Richard Kunsman
text: Amazing! This has been the best experience I've had buying a mattress. I love the no pressure and family friendly staff. I am recommending to my family and friends!!

resp.text:
Thank you for those kind words.  It was our pleasure to serve you.
We hope you are enjoying your mattress and resting well.

name: Brian Harris
text: I made the right decision in buying a mattress set from BoxDrop. I'd been in the market for sometime for a top quality affordable king sized mattress set and I found it here. The staff is very professional, helpful, and knowledgeable. I'm still enjoying my mattress set several months later. It has to be the most comfortable set I've ever purchased.

resp.text: We’re very happy to hear that you are enjoying your king mattress set. Thanks for the great review!

name: Chris Hartley
text: Great quality (name brands) and amazing prices.

resp.text: We hope you are enjoying your mattress and resting well. Thanks for the review.

name: Greg Padgett
text: Purchased a queen Sapphire Sleep Copper Memory foam for my son.  He LOVES it!

resp.text: We are glad he is enjoying the mattress.  Thanks for the great review!

name: Joseph Hay
text: I'm biased because I know the manager. He's one of the most professional people I know  in this industry. Mingledorff's only hire Top notch people! That's what I see.

name: Joseph Miller
text: Great staff.

name: Melissa Morrow
text: The man unloading me was very rude I was the only truck there and it took over 4 hours to unload my truck

name: Wilson Lenidrik
text: Nice place friendly service and clean and they unld

name: DEE AIR
text: Great place for all ur ac needs

name: Phillip Clemens
text: MoSt of the time excellent service

name: Richard Jackson
text: Great People, but it's a tight little back into the dock. Pull as far as you can against sidewalk into oncoming lane to stop and open doors and wait for an opening to cut out and block the whole road to get backed in. Go slow and be careful, 4wheelers don't wait for you to get backed in; they just whizz right around you and it would be easy to swing the front around and catch somebody as they're trying to squeak by. Other than the hassle of getting into and out of there, everything is great about the place.

name: Dana Maxwell
text: Gorgeous selection of tiles! Lovely lady helped me!

name: Bryon Myers
text: Ordered some mags when they arrived they were not as I ordered so I sent back they charged me a 15% restocking fee on the items that they sent out wrong not what I ordered I would not recommend this company!

name: Gary Grimes
text: Although this facility is not retail and not normally open to the public it is an honor to have it here and a great asset to Bessemer and the surrounding communities including Hoover.  Steyr Arms has an international reputation for high quality and innovation that reflects well on our communities.  This facility also provides many high paying jobs that support the economic well being of our communities far more than restaurants and retail establishments.  While it keeps a low profile relative to the general public it is a great asset to have it here.  This is the type of facility that communities compete for.

name: Greg L
text: Their open house they conduct every year is very nice.  High quality firearms.  Very nice staff.

name: Lonewalker Causey
text: Drove 3 hours to get there well worth it. Love Steyr firearms. Enjoyed the open house so much to see.

name: Stokes Huffman
text: Great selection of high quality firearms and hunting and shooting attire. Staff is extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful. You can not go wrong with STEYR.

name: Adam Grass
text: Just got of the phone with Jeff, the pistol tech, and I am very pleased. Firing pin spring is wore out, he is sending me one free of charge. Great customer service.

name: Kenny Click
text: Very helpful during my visit. Glad to be able to purchase one of your fine firearms.

name: John Ludwig
text: Some of the finest production made firearms in the world.  We are very lucky to have them here in the USA.  The town of Steyr Austria started making arms in 1370 and has been doing so ever since.  Besides the Steyr firearms they are also importing Anschutz and Merkel firearms.  Those companies are also world renowned and round out the line of products very well.  They have a very nice showroom displaying both Hunting/Sporting equipment as well as Law Enforcement/Military products.

name: Billy Hall
text: Great products! Excellent staff and a great selection of hunting/outdoor clothing and firearms.

name: Chris Dunlap
text: Great customer service over the phone and email pleased with how they care for customers and great people

name: Michael Mildner
text: Very helpful staff, I have had correspondence with Einer Hoff (probably butchered the spelling of his name) on the identification of an old Merkel Shotgun. He was very knowledgeable on them and helped me considerably in finding out new details i did not know.

name: Wolfgang Robinson
text: Drove over from NE Atlanta that saturday morning. Was impressed with the personel and the display of the company's products.  My wife purchased a S9-A1 and I bought an Zeiss rifle scope. Excellent products. Enjoyed meeting everyone and will try and make it back next year.

name: Leslie Sirles
text: These people are serious about guns. You can even have them customized here.

name: Jeff Fuller
text: Really nice place and very friendly, helpful people.

name: Jefferson Traywick
text: Steyr makes excellent product and their U.S. facility is very nicely done and welcoming.  The staff are knowledgeable and helpful.

name: david groff
text: This place is wholesale only normal working people’s money isn’t good enough

name: John Hassard
text: Nice place to visit.

name: Jerry Hudson
text: Great service,  Friendly

name: Billy Ritch
text: Due to the passing of Mr Jeter, store was closed for a bit of time, but has now reopened under new ownership. This store has served the community of Cook Springs for over 50 yrs and has an unbelievable selection of items. Please stop by and check them out. Super friendly staff and if they don't have what you would like them to carry, just ask...they will do their best to get it. Also staff is very cycling friendly for those riding through the area.

name: Pete M. Moon
text: The staff was very helpful I was in and out of there in under an hour

name: Wolf paradox
text:
Great place they made the "InScents" brand of colored incense sticks , which were a great value and quality
Not sure but think they went out of business as the wholesalers I buy from stopped carrying their incense.

name: Pam Talley
text: Great selection of produce.. very sweet and friendly staff and I went in for fresh squash and zucchini and they were perfect fresh no scars great condition look like they had just been picked and they have several different types of tomatoes from regular green or salad tomatoes and the staff was super super friendly great place to shop

name: Cathy Solis
text:
Sawyer's is the BEST produce stand in Geneva County!

They grow super healthy fruits and vegetables. They stock local honey, jellies and jams.

Their personnel are kind, helpful and amiable.
I look forward to returning as often as possible.

name: Mike Hollingsworth
text: Excellent produce.

name: Lynn Wall
text: This is the go to place for produce. Great place

name: Butch Loveall
text: Great place for peas and butter beans and Good Ol Slocomb tomatoes. The people who work there are very helpful.

name: Kathy W
text: Best place in the area

name: Joyce Ballard
text: great, place to get fresh produce

name: Susan Hornsby
text: Excellent place for steaks!!

name: Charles Turner
text: Up on my arrival I noticed how positive the atmosphere was when I walked in. Everyone was friendly and greeted me with much respect. I actually felt very comfortable when I was there. I give a BIG thumbs up to the entire staff!!! Keep up the great work and I hope to you all soon.

name: Leighanna Nowland
text: As an employee, I want to say this is the best hands down company I have ever worked for. Team work here is amazing. We are one big family. We all work together to make sure we give the best customer service and product is delivered in a timely manner. The management could not be better! Never seen such a team work together like here at Cstore Master.

name: Nipul Patel
text: C Store Master is one best retail supplier that provides excellent customer service to their customers. They are the best and they are very reasonable prices to their products they supply to their local stores!!! Thank you

name: SADMAN SAKIB
text: Full of amazing people. Friendly and helpful staffs makes it easier to interact with them. Always concerned about the service and their customer.. I hope to see them in a more better position...

name: Kunal Patel
text: Prices and service is great! Leighanna is the sales rep that we deal with and she’s very helpful in keeping us updated on new upcoming products and new deals on all products. She takes pride in her work and her customers and goes out her way to make sure that all our needs are met in the right time manner. We are glad to be doing business with c store.

name: Jiggy Patel
text:
Have had nothing but excellent service from these guys. They have all the latest items in stock. Ms Patel and PK are exceptional people.
Keep up the good work guys!

name: Mikes A
text: Great company to work with. Always willing to work beat competitor prices. Great customer service and nice to walk in and shop

name: Carri Denson
text: Love love love!! And to top it off, Leighanna is absolutely fabulous!! Not only does she know her stuff but, she brings joy with her no matter where she goes!!!

name: Jaz Martin
text: Cstore master is absolutely great. And they couldn’t do it without Bethany and Rebecca as there sales representatives! They’re absolutely amazing at what they do😁

name: Alyson Tesseneer
text: I absolutely love c store master. Especially AJ he helps me tremendously and the driver he's wonderful.

text: Christine is awesome she’s actually has a really good character manners and passion and one of the best customer service you should keep her there.

name: Justin P
text: Difficult to find, road sign is missing for the road name and the road is on the backside of a hill. Staff wasn't in the office and had to wait for a loader for assistance.

name: Christian Dipp
text: Very quick unload. You can possibly stay the night before the gate entrance to the right side of the road. I got here at 7:15am thinking they’d open up at 8am but, to my surprise they took me right in.

name: Scott Shires
text: Friendly crew, got me in and out very quickly without sacrificing quality. They know how to load a truck properly.

name: Tom Hess
text: Fast loading, nice guys

name: David Carlson
text: Great place to unload

name: Thomas Shirland jr
text: Guys were great got unloaded really fast

name: Jerri Riggins
text: Friendly staff, mostly no waiting long,  and unloading is fast. Pre - load are here too for certain companies with contractor.

name: Harold Burkett
text: This is the go to place for hardwood lumbers, sheet woods, trim and flooring. Theres probably a lot of other things they sell too, but those are just the things i buy from there. John and his staff are phenomenal. They are very knowledgeable and always take great care of me anytime I go up there. Plus they have much better grade materials  up there at far cheaper prices than box stores.

name: J Cloud
text: Extremely helpful.  Came to buy about $80 worth of Poplar hardwood lumber and the manager himself took me around to pick it out.  He spent extra time helping me with a small house-hold project as well that really did not profit him or his business.  I will be back!

name: Tina Nailer
text: I love this place. Prices are great. Hardwood flooring and all your flooring needs. The people are wonderful. I will be back!

name: Jesse James
text: Friendly, helpful and great prices! Highly recommend.

text: Love this place, very helpful and prices are great ☺

name: Jonathan Lecroy
text: Extremely rude and unprofessional. Came here to buy a new front entry door for my house, left frustrated. Don't bother making the drive!

name: Drew Tindor
text: On off smoker and vapor for years. Discovered Cyclops brand at a vape show a few years ago and fell in love with HADES. Ordered from their website a few days ago. Great price, fast shipping.

name: Jason Byrd
text: The are in Daphne Al. Right off Friendship road and they sell eliquid in the front. Less than $35 for a 120 of good quality juice. Always friendly.

name: David Nowlin
text: Negating the quality of the juice and quick shipping, the email answers and care the team at Cyclops has shown to me with my questions and the advice that they have shown me has been the very best. Thanks

name: Lynn Parsons
text: Excellent customer service and shipping. I order online and it is usually shipped within an hour or so if I order during business hours.

name: Jennifer Thacker
text:
Love this company. I’ve ordered from them for years. Shipping is super fast and product outshines any vape juice I’ve purchased. BRAVO!!!!  You cannot beat the price and quality.
I loved the glass bottles, but the plastic ones are much more convenient. Posiden has ALWAYS been my favorite ❤️

name: Cody Lawson
text: Absolutely love these guys. Their juices are awesome. I'm actually going there right now to get some green apple and berry cobbler.

text: Colossus vanilla custard and cosmic fog milk and honey r the to best of best e- liquids around when buy them buy as much as u can afford / on a scale from 1 to 10 both r 10 plus they have no flaws

text: Excellent e-liquid at a great price!  My favorite is the Artemis (berry cobbler).  I've been vaping a few years and found this to be my first real all day vape.

name: Daniel Cook
text: One of the first liquids I've tried out and I still love their Hades (Roasted Cofee). Always at a fair price as well.

text: Very disappointed with this company. I had a $63 credit for it and hadn't used it for a couple years. They told me too bad you lost it. Extremely unfair and extremely unprofessional I will never order from them again.

resp.text: Very sorry about your experience.  Please give us a call and ask for A/R and we will resolve this for you.  Thank you.

name: Patrick Wolf
text: J D is an excellent unloader

name: Michael Henderson
text: Good parts, good people behind counter. Sometimes they need a couple more people behind counter. But overall excellent.

name: me to you
text:
Great place to sell your pecan.

I drove by there on Monday and never saw a sign.  Even with the GPS on Wednesday, I never saw a sign. I drive past the building, turned around, and had to call them to get guided in.

I saw the building but have never seen any of the three signs on the property. None of the 3 signs are clear, distinctive, or easily noticeable or readable.  The 2 signs with the fancy scroll work are not readable when driving in a vehicle.  Even walking and looking at them you have to take time to figure out what all the fancy scrool work is all about.
The sign near the road is not lighted and does not jump out at you.  I frequently pass that building and have never noticed any of the 3 signs.

The best sign for that building is bold black letters on a white background.  No fancy scroll work, no yellow or green colors because those are colors that fade into the background, and hang it at the front of the building where it jumps out at you, is right in your face, and can never be missed because it is very noticeable.

name: Fredrick Ikpelue
text: They got everything you need

name: MaddMatt !
text: Amazing company, amazing service, amazing people. I worked with Patrick and he was able to get me all the answers I needed to place the proper order. Its not normal for people to go the extra mile nowadays but the folks at Fleetsafety do!! Will be buying more stuff!!

name: IntuitSolutions Company
text: We were scrambling to find a good deal on fire retardant gloves for our fire college.  Fleet Safety was the best!  Thanks for all of your help, guys!  We'll be sure to go to them for any equipment we need!

name: Chris Grace
text: Very professional,competent and knowledgeable. Nate really goes out of his way to make sure we receive the utmost in customer service. My cars will not go anywhere else!

name: J-Paul Villagomez (Kahuna_671)
text: If you're looking for light-bars and emergency lights as well as installation this is the place you want to be

name: Carl Jackson
text: Great people. One stop seed source

name: Sandra Bradley
text: Best store when I come home from Jersey.   First store I go to and get my conecuh sausages and ship them home.  Only wish they shipped i would be there best customer here in Jersey.

name: Rita Barren
text: I had been all over the Mobile area trying to find items for my youth fundraiser until I walked into Cash 'n Carry for the first time EVER! All of my carryout plates, sauce container, rolls if grease absorbent paper towels, huge bags of fries, and cases of fish. I was in "Fundraising heaven!" It's not the most organized or cleanest place it could be, but the items and prices were great.

name: Joseph Rudnicky
text: Very high price.  4 or 5 dollars more then sams club. Very disappointed 😞

name: Abu Anas
text: Great customer service

name: Sassha M
text: I like getting all my different snacks from this store. Even though Frito Lays went up on their chips, they're still the same price as the other brand chips, cookies, and crackers. I like that I can get the freeze popsicles all year round. I don't really shop the meat selection except for the Swai fillets for $22 but I started getting them from Walmart cheaper now. The employees are friendly and they don't have a problem with helping you find what you're looking for and they're usually very nice.

name: Kakresha Bradley
text: Love the location of the store and always greeted with a smile....

name: Ophelia Wright
text: Very affordable!!! and that's what we need now a days...👍Great sales

text: My first time shopping here. I in up With bad 🍗 it was black they freeze was dirty some of there food not up to dated you got to look at it careful .prices not on the food you got to keep asking how much is this they getting mad.going to try the other cash&carry out hope its better over their

name: Amanda Anderson
text: 24 buck’s for 12 filters!!

name: jane k
text: Excellent service & professional staff - great quality and selection.  Aly was helpful and offered  exceptional customer service.

resp.text:
Hi Jane,
Thanks so much for the feedback. We're thrilled to hear you were met with excellent customer service. We value your feedback and always look forward to new projects. Take care!

name: Brandy Lassiter
text: I absolutely adore this place everyone is very friendly very proactive to your needs and the manager awesome great personality all the way down to the person that load your vehicle superb service. Great products at a affordable price check them out.

resp.text:
Hi Brandy,
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're happy to hear you have great experiences at our showroom. We value your feedback and hope to have you in the store again soon. Stop by and see us anytime, take care!

name: Daphne Tyson
text: Excellent customer service. We are doing a bathroom remodel and needed shower hardware right away. Chris Uhle and Robert Benton were able to help us get the products we needed and I was able to do everything by phone and email which is so comforting considering our current health crisis. I will definitely use this company for our upcoming renovations!

resp.text:
Hi Daphne,
Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear working alongside our showroom team on your bath remodel was a great experience. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely pass it on. Come back and see us anytime, take care!

name: Bill Hart
text: Great place, helpful people

resp.text:
Hi Bill,
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're happy to hear you have great experiences at our showroom. We value your feedback and hope to have you in the store again soon. Stop by and see us anytime, take care!

name: michelle dickens
text: Excellent customer service. Good selection of products. Very pleased with my purchase. They even shipped the tile for me.

resp.text:
Hi Michelle,
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're so happy to hear you enjoy visiting our showroom and working with our team. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you in the store again soon. Come back and see us anytime, take care!

name: Kelly Pennell
text: I give Scott 5 stars for great service, but overall Pro Source gets 3 stars for communication. Was told our tile would arrive in 5 days, but it's now day 15. I understand that they can't control delivery, but they should contact their customers to let them know about changes.

resp.text:
Hi Kelly,
Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review. Reviews are integral to our continuous growth as a showroom and client and member satisfaction are our top priority. We are disappointed to hear about the problem with the delivery of your tile from the supplier and apologize for any inconvenience.

name: richard chambers
text: Premier service - they recently went out of their way to help ship an order when it did not arrive on time and helped to save our project timeline. Great company, I highly recommend you giving then a call or stopping by and asking for Allan.

resp.text:
Hi Richard,
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We're so pleased to hear you enjoyed working with our showroom team and received fantastic service. We appreciate your feedback and can't wait to have you in the store again soon. Take care!

name: Carolyn Hasser
text: The people there were so helpful and had exactly what I wanted. They helped me with ideas and concepts. The prices were in line with what is available out there.

resp.text:
Hi Carolyn,
Thanks for the review. We're so happy to hear you enjoyed working with our showroom team. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to have you in the store again soon. Take care!

name: John Doss
text: This place is awesome they have a huge show room with a very wide variety of selections. The Price is is wonderful, and Aly is an Amazing sales lady she has more knowledge of products, installation techniques, and designs than most flooring contractors I have met. be sure and go by and visit ProSource you'll be impressed like we were. PS I'm a contractor not a store employee.

name: Jeff Conley
text: If you have a need for drywall, this IS the place to go !!! I'm thankful they are moving to Tuscumbia, closer to me

resp.text: Jeff, Thank you for the great review. We truly appreciate your business.

text: Best products. Best prices and a product knowledgeable staff. Keep up the good work.

text: I've never had to wait, their staff is very professional and they've always had what I needed.

name: Matthew Green
text: awesome 👍

text: Fast service

text: Great place. Quick service. The warehouse guys are friendly and helpful.

name: John Holt
text: Friendly and courteous staff, fast unloading.

name: Lamhro
text: Fast unloading

name: T O
text: Make sure you do not buy more than you need, they charge a 20% restocking fee for any returned product.

name: Tiffany Mikuchonis
text:
Difficult process. Weigh your trailer when coming in, has to be in just the perfect spot to be okay. Tandems must be all the way forward. Once you get the okay, pull off scale, then move your tandems all the way back. Proceed then, to the next guard shack to give them all the same information again.
Finally drop your trailer, then go to the adjoining property for empty trailers or loaded.
Oh, and the load we had going out should've been ready yesterday evening. No one knows why it's not ready, of course. But predicted to not be ready until tonight at 1700. This was a JIT load to Ohio tomorrow afternoon. Smh.

name: shoanu kumar
text: no overnight parking. in and out within an hour for unloading. friendly staff

name: William Chitwood
text: 2 1/2 hours to load. Will not take you early but does have a place to park until your appointment time. Bad part is JB Hunt drivers love to park right in front of the dock doors.

name: Louis Robinson
text: They dropping trailers at the construction site is the only difference I notified since been there last year!

name: melvin cummings
text: Despite the bad reviews by some,  I found this place to be very decent. The back side doors are a little tight but not the rest.  My appointment was at 10:30 pm and they took me early and had me loaded in 30 minutes. There is a gaurd shack and then another call booth to give your pickup info but this was not a bad place to pickup from and I love places like this.

name: AHMD ADN
text: Worst place to pick up live load,

text: Don’t come 10-11 hours for loading,stupid place.

text: Drivers avoid this place! Unorganized, unmarked. Wasted one hour just to get to the right shipping department. Very unorganized place.

name: Andrew Ellis

text: To many Chiefs and not enough Indians

name: Holman Plays Games
text: Andrew was a pleasure to deal with. Very professional and ready to help. Will definitely do business the for the foreseeable future. City Ice inc. Phillip Holman field tech.

name: Connie Bodine
text: Great manager!

name: Brittney Toro
text: Absolutely amazing costumer service. These ladies went above and beyond. My first time using this supply store and I will definitely be switching from my regular place and be a regular here from now on.

name: Kim Gann
text: The customer service at this location is amazing. Taylor was so helpful recently with an issue I had on my account and even called me to follow up and let me know she handled it! Thank you Taylor!

name: Amber Rodriguez
text: If only they would get more of these in stock!!

name: gina guess
text: Friendly, professional staff. Usually have all things in stock. Very dependable. Long work history with this family owned business. Look forward yo many more years doing business with them.

name: Wayne Boles
text: Did not have what my wife was looking for but offered an alterative with return for free if she did not like it.

name: Michael Young (Mike Young)
text: I stopped  by there on Tuesday December 10, 2019  at 2:02 PM I was in the store for about five minutes I saw at least five or six employees not one greeted me and no  one offered to help me, although I walked the entire store twice and could not find what I was looking for for my wife.  very poor customer service very unhappy will never come back!!!

name: Yolanda Hardin
text: Cashier was very helpful and nice I found me some clippers n trimmers exactly what I was looking for thanks again

name: Jennifer Liberatore
text: Clean and nice employees- just didn’t have everything I needed.

name: Scott Seeley
text: Staff has always been quick to help. Plus they have a sweet rewards program that earns a nice discount - but you have to jump on the offer as it typically expires quickly.

text: Amazing people, great products. Never left unhappy. Would definitely recommend going here!

text: Truckers, there's a place to park your truck on the south side of Wholesale Ave NE to walk up to the office, it's a small sign, easy to miss or drive past, look for the Huntsville Wood sign on the north side of the road, then look right quickly.

text: Love It, Great products , to car wash liquid , to wax, and Leather Care. The best place to go.

text: You can't find any better products for keeping your vehicle looking like new than S &N products. It just doesn't get any better! !

text: Poor customer service, rude cashier prices ok.Oh how I miss Ray Putnam and family .Former long time customer.

text: Top Notch Company!

name: Jim Woods
text: Tight covered dock but a worker helped me back in.

name: T. Whit
text: Was here today for daughter’s wedding flowers for bridesmaids, and they did not disappoint. Great selection and very helpful. They have more ribbon than you can imagine for custom wreaths or other projects.

name: Alyces Floral
text: Great place to shop and Patti and her girls are very helpful

name: Jim Glass
text: Great place to go to for most all of your needs.

name: James Norris
text: Love the place, staff is extremely friendly.

name: Ruth Forster
text: thrift store finds for retail prices.

name: sherry kirkland
text: There awesome.

name: Deanna G
text: I was so impressed by this company today! I placed my order at 12:30 yesterday afternoon and had it delivered by FedEx at 10:30 this morning! That has to be the fastest service I've ever had! I will definitely be a repeat customer! Thank you so much!

resp.text: Deanna, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  it means a lot to us, and we look forward to working with you more.

name: Matt Chapman
text: This is the one and only business that I purchase my supplies from. They always have everything I’m in need of and at great prices! I purchase materials strictly for candle making and the selection and quality of the wax and fragrances are top notch. The owners are beyond friendly and knowledgeable about all products offered. Any question that I have they are sure to explain it fully to me and they don’t make it seem like you are bothering them if you have a lot of questions to ask. I’m local to the area, so I’m proud to support this local business! If you are in need for any materials for your candle and soap making, look no further!

resp.text: Matt, thank you so much for your kind review.  We appreciate  your business!

name: mp3 jay
text: I was referred to Community Candle by someone in a candle group on Facebook. I’m so happy with my fragrance oil and the fast shipping. I am a new forever customer.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We look forward to working with you.

name: Teneha Tate
text: Whenever I go to Community Candle and Soap Supply I always have the greatest customer service experience ever!!! I love their fragrance oils and candle vessels. Always helpful!!! Top notch service.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It means a lot to us that you took the time to leave a review.

name: E B
text: My shop had a horrible experience with this company. The lids we received were dented and covered in paint. The owner told us to use our fingernails to try to scrape the paint off. They’d still be dented and unusable at our store. Some of the jars were cracked and one was shattered. The jars were also not as described (not straight sided, smaller than the dimensions given, etc). We disputed it with PayPal after no response to our calls. They’ve also ignored our last message. We waited a few weeks to try to mediate this and come to a better solution but after being ripped off and left with damaged product, I’m here leaving this review. This is the first negative one I’ve ever left, but I want others to be aware of their business practices. Please consider buying from another company if you’re wanting anything fragile. They do not offer refunds or exchanges, even if the fault lays with them.

name: Leslie Hahn
text: I have had nothing but wonderful experiences every time I have been here. The owners are knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly. The level of customer service here is top notch. I love that we have a local company that we can get our supplies from. They are never to busy to answer questions or offer much needed advice. They really try to help you and make sure that you get the best deal  on products. It is always a pleasure to go and get our supplies. I can honestly say that I have never had a complaint, even when I have forgotten something on my order, they do their best to added it in quickly for me with no extra wait time. This is just an all around wonderful company!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Leslie. We appreciate your business!

name: Kyle Dunkling
text: Awesome staff and processing time!!! We really appreciate all the hard work you guys do.

resp.text: Thanks, Kyle. We are very fortunate to have fantastic customers who are so easy to work with!

name: Jenifer Davis
text: I ordered last week and it was shipped the same day! I'm super impressed with the shipping and the products were perfect!

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  We are happy we got it right for you.

name: Sister Christonypmhi
text: A great group of people.  I have been ordering soap supplies out of state and got tired of shipping fees.  After researching on the internet I found Community Candles.  They are a short drive from me.  No more shipping fees....!  I picked up my order the next day.  Well worth the two hour drive on a pretty day.  Everyone was knowledgeable and friendly.   I couldn't ask for more.

resp.text: Sister we love seeing your smiling face when you come visit.  Thank you for your 5 star review.  We really appreciate it.

name: d b
text: My wife and I use Community Candle Supply products for most everything we make in-house at our pharmacy. We make soaps, mists, and bath bombs and they have been so kind to us from day one. We are grateful to have found them and love that we are supporting another family's small business. They are the best!

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review!  We have enjoyed seeing you succeed with all the products you make.  I am excited that we are able to supply you with some of your needs to grow your business.

name: Betsy Whitfield
text: Great place to get candle supplies, get help when I have a question

resp.text: Thank you, Betsy, for the review.  We feel like you and Pete are family.  :)

name: Colby Iaconnetti
text: Buyers beware! very poor customer service! We received broken products, owners wouldn’t respond to most of our emails, they refused to refund or fix the problem...

resp.text: Well, I know this is actually Chelsea S. Chelsea you know we offered to replace the lids that you say were damaged and we also offered to allow you to return the jars and lids for a refund. You elected not to do that because we do not pay for return shipping as outlined on our “About Us” page. We are sorry you feel the need to leave such misleading reviews under different names on our business, but we did make every effort to remedy this issue, and our customers know that we do not treat people the way you describe. I wish you all the best in finding a supplier you can be happy with.

name: Brandon Morgan
text: I own Morgan Valley Candles and I LOVE that Community Candle is here in the Birmingham area. They are so helpful and really know their candle biz. I am a growing small business and I believe in doing as much small business to small business as I can. If you need any type of candle, soap, lotion or other type of supply, this is the place you need to go.

resp.text: Brandon thanks for taking the time to leave a review of our business.  We really appreciate your support and your business.  Hope all is well!

name: Kimberly Ford
text: Love this local company! It’s more than a candle supply store,  Always stocked with everything I need to make soaps, bath bombs, lotion and all my other bath products I sell! The staff is always helpful and has a smile on their face come check community candle supply out!

resp.text: Hey Kim!  Thanks for leaving us a review.  I am so happy we are able to provide you with most of what you need for your business.  I love knowing that the goods we sell help create small businesses!

name: shawnie hale
text: Omg!!!! Love this business to the fullest,I have had nothing but the best of service from this group of people, very friendly, very helpful whenever I ask a question about something I'm giving a straight forward answer. I'm way over an hour drive away but I think their products are very much well worth the drive vs ordering from somewhere that you cannot get your product the same day and then having to pay all those shipping fees nope not me and as long as I'm making candles or anything else I will continue to use CCSS.

resp.text: Shawnie thanks for the 5 star review.   Our customers are truly what makes this "Community" Candle Supply.  <3

name: electriqss
text: I just want to say I love watching the video over and over again of those ladies driving their car into that pit, looking for "Candle Supplies"!!!

resp.text: Hi LeAnne.  Glad you enjoy that video, but those poor ladies had quite a lot of damage to their car.  I was so grateful that they won the AFV prize.  Let us know if we can ever help you with candle or soap supplies now that you know about us.

name: A M
text: First time visiting the location today...was highly recommended by a friend....was not disappointed at all...great scents....great prices....and SUPER friendly staff!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind review, April.  I am glad you were pleased and we hope to see you again soon.

name: Crystal Dawn
text: Overall a great place to get supplies for my soap making.

resp.text: Cystal thanks for taking the time to leave us a review.  I know there are probably a million things you could be doing with your time, so I really appreciate it!

name: claude jones
text:
I love all the many fragrances as well as the help I get in making choices .
Thank you guys.

resp.text: Our pleasure! I love selecting and buying all of those fragrances as well.  It's one of my favorite things to do here.  We have lots of new fragrances so be sure to check out the "New Fragrance" category.  Thanks for your business and your 5 star review.

name: Katie S.
text: I've made quite a few orders from CCS. They have a wide selection of materials and have been very friendly and helpful when I pick up my orders. I highly recommend getting your candle, soap, kitchen, etc. supplies here!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review, Katie! We appreciate your business.

name: Gail Davis
text:
Was one of the worst today one of the owners instead of wanting to talk to us or let the young lady up front help us they said to use the computer out front no one was in the store I'm old fashion I like to talk face to face they lost out on another additional sell today also I have had one of the owners look at me and tell me I was not expecting you.
Went by to talk about the problem instead of fixing the problem they just wanted me to redo the review. The owner Robert just wanted to argue instead of trying to fix a problem .  They said until you fix the review not to order anything else . Will Not Recommend this place to anyone.

resp.text:
Hi Gail (Ellen). Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry you were disappointed in us yesterday.

Every customer is important to us, and we do our best to serve everyone whether we are busy or not.  As most supply warehouses do these days , we are encouraging our customers to use the web site whenever possible.   This helps us keep errors and miscommunication to a minimum and it keeps our expenses down so we can maintain low prices.  It also helps us so that we can work on other behind-the-scenes tasks or web orders that are already being processed.

name: kelli grossmyer
text: The video of the women really is the best.

resp.text: :)  Those poor ladies.  Kelli, check us out if we can ever help you with candle or soap making supplies.

name: Rosa Pavlak
text: My granny was trying to find this store but ended up driving her car into a loading dock. 1/5

resp.text: We have never done business with Jorji or his granny.  Perhaps one day they will allow us to earn their 5-star rating.

name: Wendy Brasher
text: Great supply store and great people

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review, Wendy!

name: Earl Davis
text: will not do business with this company again the owners are very rude and lies about if they have done business with a person         oh but we have done business and I have talked to a lot of people that is upset with yall  I think maybe I need to send a review to the BBB

resp.text: According to our very detailed sales records, we have never done business with an Earl Davis.

name: Amanda Thomas
text: Love this place!

resp.text: Amanda thank you for the feedback!  We will try to keep earning your 5 stars!

name: Kole Wilson
text: Great local family business, friendly staff and can get you just about anything you would need. Just a great service experience shoping here for 4 years, just about weekly.

name: Harvey Young
text: A good place to buy Hardware stuff

name: Frank Self
text: Worked with this company for many years.  Now retired, but thankful this family was a part of my life!!  I miss you!

name: Janie Stilwell
text: great place for grass seed mix.

name: Richard Gwin
text: The drivers they hire can't drive. If you see one of their trucks on the road, watch out. They'll probably try and run you off the road.

name: Wanda Clark
text: A little hard to locate even with GPS.  Nice family business and helpful selecting our Christmas tree farm products.

name: DJ Hosey Ho
text: Great customer service and great price . Best in tru city area no doubt

name: Brooke Farrow
text: I’ve been doing business with this place for over 3 years and never once have I been over charged! Nor had poor quality! My customers have always had very good service from me and their items! I love the customer service! Love that their right around the corner as well

name: Jill Rolls
text: I just found Vinyl Couture and I’ve never been happier. The vinyl is great! Richard cut some logos for me and they look amazing. He is reasonably priced too. Michelle sells the vinyl and she’s as nice and honest as they come. I did read in one of the reviews somebody didn’t like the area. Don’t judge a book by its cover. They are amazing people and will help you anyway they can. They work out of their home and it’s a nice home. I would think people who need vinyl would understand that because I work out of my home too. I applaud them for that because overhead in a business will hurt your wallet. That’s good business sense to me.  I will recommend them to everyone!

name: Will Dockery
text: Excellent products, friendly staff... if you dream it up they will make It so. Vinyl art craftsmanship of the highest order.

name: Mandy Insco
text: When I first started my business I was being overcharged ALL OF THE TIME. I stumbled on this shop and greeted by some kind people. They always take care of me. I message them what vinyl I need even when it is last minute and they are quick with their response time. I get amazing heat transfer vinyl and sticky. As well as other materials that my customers love. I would recommend them to anyone and in fact I have! I will always choose them over anyone else because they are kind and always helpful. <3

name: Liz C
text: They have the best vinyl around, and for great prices too! Melissa and Richard are very friendly and always ready to help in any way they can! Love this place!

name: Kendra Golson
text: I love going here . Vinyl right on the spot . Any color metallic you want . Price is AWESOME . You will not be disappointed

name: Conley Brothers
text: Cheap Chinese products sold under the banner of the American flag. Disgraceful. They peeled off after just one use.

resp.text: This is a fake review, this is not a real person they have never done business with me. Funny how the 1 star reviews all have double digit likes and the real reviews do not.

name: Zod
text: Overpriced and poor quality.  Dishonest people.

resp.text: This is a fake review, this is not a real person and you have never done business with me. Funny how the only 1 star reviews have double digit likes and all the real reviews do not.

name: INSCO DESIGNS
text: Awesome vinyl A+ service he went out of his way to help me after normal hours and he local I plan on using vinyl couture for all my vinyl needs!!

name: Sarah Perring
text: Awesome people to do business with. I love their printed vinyl.

name: pc24681
text: Quick loading! Keep up the great work guys 🙂

name: nestor sevilla
text:
Excellent place for Delivery
FCFS
Fast unloading with in 30 min

resp.text:
Nestor,

Thank you for the great review. We truly appreciate it.

Ken Boster – Branch Manager
Cell Pak
(256) 260-2151

name: Jason Allen
text: Wouldn’t use their product if it was given to me. Saw videos of what goes on here. Night shift makes up test results, just trashy people smoking all over, and terrible people on safety. Ordered 2 loads and it was all garbage. And now I know why!

name: Jeanette Terry
text: U fired my brother for no damn reason

name: Tina Lolley
text: Best people best prices!

name: Silvano Marchant
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent help to find places.

(Original)
Exelente ayuda para encontrar lugares .

name: johnny bigmack13
text: Nice polite people but be sure to bring your lunch, if your delivering here it tends to take all day just to set off a few bundles 👎

name: Max Ve
text: If you want to spent on loading 5-7 hours- you are welcome 😁

name: Christopher Cain
text: Rates are good but load times are horrible!!!!  If they had a place for the loaded trucks to move to tarp after getting loaded that would help a great deal!!!  As it is you get loaded and you have to tarp where they load you which holds up the next truck getting loaded!!

name: Dalia Pena
text: They take about 3 hours to loaded a truck after been waiting for 2 hours  . I dont know why they require an appointment.

name: Anthony H
text: I loaded at building 7 which is on the right side when coming down the street. Was loaded immediately, no wait at all.

name: Lone Wolf
text: Judging by the attitude and rudeness of the employees in shipping and receiving, this must be a horrible place to work.

name: Eric Gibson
text: Shipping doesn't get in till 8am not 6am when receiving does

name: Robert “Jack” McCutcheon
text: Fast and friendly unload

name: Николай Бабич
text: Slower and worse workers will be difficult to find.  Loaded all day.

name: Andy Specht
text: Very, very slow. Plan on several hours. They don't have a scale on site.

name: Codax inc
text: Good people . Decent place for PU for fb.

name: Reynold Payret
text: 5 hours to charge SLOW

name: John Messing
text: Been there often ( Combined transport) never had a problem. In and tarped two hours...

name: Grigore Bozu
text: 5 h wating to get the loud

name: larry Evans
text: I was there for 6 1/2 long hours getting loaded. I watched 4 so called bosses sit in the office and laugh and just bs. While the guys loading were out there poking around. There is no reason to take that long to load anyone.  I WILL NEVER GO BACK....

name: Serega Yjin
text: after 5 1/2 hours of waiting began to ship...

name: randy taylor
text: Been sitting here 2hrs already and they haven't even started unloading me. Sitting in a bay and everything. The employees are very rude and like to talk down to you. I have no plans on returning ever.

name: Charles Whaley
text: This place is slow. Wise idea, unload the trks that are here waiting to be unloaded first before you start loading a spot trailer or maybe have two people. One to unload and one to load. Drivers using electronic logs will burn up their 14 hr clock here.

name: James Anderson
text: Needed tires for a recent auto we purchased. Great deal! Will be back for next set.

name: 3l33TsTEElE
text: Good service. Small enough for individual attention.

name: Robert Knie
text: Great people, very helpful. Tire warehouse.

name: Brent White
text: #1 in tire distribution! Friendly, helpful staff.

name: Layn Sewell
text: I know everyone

name: Cindy Thomas
text: GREAT PRICES...

name: Michael Skinner
text: Not open to the public

name: Mike & Chance Bentley
text: We have been using Kendall Hartcraft  for our framing needs for over 25 years .  The staff is friendly, professional and products are delivered quickly.  The frames are beautiful and well made allowing our clients many years of enjoyment from their portraits. If any problems arise such as damages in shipping, your client has issues with products or generally anything is not right, they have always been more than accommodating.   We love this company and will continue our longstanding relationship with them.

resp.text: We appreciate the time you took to leave us such an amazing review. We have been beyond privileged to have such wonderful customers such as yourself. We look forward to many more years of working together!

name: F. Slate
text: As a professional photographer you always look for the best products to offer your clients, I ave found these at Kendall Hartcraft. Their knowledge of the industry and wonderful customer service goes above and beyond.

name: Bean Webster
text: great products!!! great selection!! Thanks guys

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate you taking the time out and letting us know how we did.

name: F. Slate
text: Mirror Renovations has restored my faith in D.I.Y. home projects! On Pinterest to frame your bathroom mirror it involved me owning and operating a miter saw, taping pieces up after applying liquid nail glue and it was all just to much! Mirror Renovations allowed me to enter my measurements online, pick out my frame I wanted and they shipped it to me for free. All I needed to assemble my frame was a Phillips head screw driver and I had a brand new mirror up in less than 10 minutes. It covers my mirror clips and the frame is flush to the mirror, no one can tell it wasn't hung as one piece. I tell everyone about you guys and I am so grateful to you!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so excited to hear about successful D.I.Y. renovations with our mirror frames. We loved your before and after images you sent us and we cant wait to share them!

name: Sam Reeder
text: Delivering a load here and went to the guard shack before they opened due to bad directions from my company. Had an extremely rude guard yelling at me to leave and come back in an hour. No signs and phone number won’t work until 8am, what do you want me to do you clown?

name: Slim Slim
text: Nice warehouse out in the woods just have to get there before the warehouse closes or your going to have a long night. And always check in at the security booth.

name: Floyd M
text: IF you need Lumper services You must have cash$$$$ No checks accepted drop trailer and bobtail to an ATM

name: Todd Ledet
text: I highly recommend W.L. Petrey Wholesale Inc. to anyone looking to partner with a grocery wholesaler. It has a huge selection of items to choose from and a truly exceptional team. They are always friendly and pleasant to interact with and will ensure you receive what you need, when you need it.

name: Anthony Coward
text: 8/25/2020 Appt 9am/Arrived/Partial Unload/Departed. SP-48527...

text: As a trucker, they unloaded me right away, in/out in half hour 👍
